drum.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick
drum.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
Trumpeter Red Rodney was playing with Kenny Clarke on drums  (=playing the drums).
drum.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a large round container for storing liquids such as oil, chemicals etc
drum.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: something that looks like a drum, especially part of a machine
drum.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to make a sound similar to a drum by hitting a surface again and again
drum.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: I could hear the rain drumming against the windows.
Lisa drummed her fingers impatiently on the table.
drum.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a large round container for storing liquids such as oil, chemicals etc
